Title: G19 Glower
Description: Application for the Logitech G19 keyboard to change the colour of the keyboard as you type. Basic effect is to glow the keyboard more as you type, but there are other modes available. It is also fully customizable and plugin based, so feel free to change it all you wish!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Application for the Logitech G19 keyboard to change the colour of the keyboard as you type. Basic effect is to glow the keyboard more as you type, but there are other modes available. It is also fully customizable and plugin based, so feel free to change it all you wish!

See a video of this in action here.

I have made this for the love of coding and because it's cool. If you would like to totally make my day though, feel free to donate!

Credits to Tsuyo of http://tsuyo.de, for GLight: http://www.logitechusers.com/showthread.php?t=8049 For allowing me to actually change the keyboard colour in the first place ;)
